title: Animal Costumes
description: Have you ever seen an animal dressed in a costume? In Animal Costumes, students will gain information about animals and the types of costumes they wear through humorous photographs. Emergent readers will be supported by repetitive sentence patterns and high-frequency words. While learning about this interesting topic, students will have the opportunity to identify the author's purpose, as well as to recognize simple subjects as they read this book.
meta: bandanna, costumes, fins, mane, snout, wear
Short Vowel Sounds : Discriminate short vowel /i/ sound
Simple Subject : Recognize and use simple subjects
High-Frequency Words : Identify and use the high-frequency word too

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
